name: Six Sided Solids
description:
Six Sided Solids

A Puzzle game where you can only use each thing once. Including the functions if they have any!

My quest for zero physics and zero collisions continues. Pure maths baby!

Procedural soudtrack will never be the same twice. It just remixes itself forever.

Level editor. Copy to clipboard and share them with each other.

Controls:

Arrows - movement

ad - camera

space - actions, start, end etc.

q/Esc - back

lmb - click on booster and bomb to activate / add lives in editor

ws - up and down in editor

I ran out of time to add all the levels I needed to introduce everything. You can play with the rest in the custom editor.

The Crunch was real!

Post your levels in the comments and play each others. (be carefull anything other than exact causes crashes).

Expect bugs

Peace TheSoulSelector
